form.longName: PhenX PX031402 - Substances Lifetime Abuse And Dependence
form.preferredDefinition: Respondents answer questions from the National Epidemiologic Survey on Alcohol and Related Conditions-III (NESARC-III) related to their lifetime use of illicit and prescribed substances.

question.questionText: In your entire life, Did you EVER find that your usual amount of a medicine or drug had much less effect on you than it once did? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_usual_amount)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_usual_amount_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_usual_amount_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_usual_amount_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_usual_amount_prior_last_year_drug_names)
In your entire life, Did you EVER find that you had to use much more of a medicine or to get the effect you wanted? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_more_same_effect)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_more_same_effect_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_more_same_effect_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_more_same_effect_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_more_same_effect_prior_last_year_drug_names)
Did you EVER sleep more than usual (when the effects of a medicine or drug were wearing off)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_sleep_more)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_sleep_more_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_sleep_more_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_sleep_more_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_sleep_more_prior_last_year_drug_names)
Did you EVER feel weak or tired? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_weak_tired)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_weak_tired_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_weak_tired_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_weak_tired_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_weak_tired_prior_last_year_drug_names)
Did you EVER feel depressed? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_depressed)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_depressed_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_depressed_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_depressed_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_depressed_prior_last_year_drug_names)
Did you EVER find your heart beating fast (when the effects of a medicine or drug were wearing off)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_heart_beating_fast)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_heart_beating_fast_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_heart_beating_fast_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_heart_beating_fast_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_heart_beating_fast_prior_last_year_drug_names)
Did you EVER have nausea or vomiting? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_nausea)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_nausea_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_nausea_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_nausea_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_nausea_prior_last_year_drug_names)
Did you EVER yawn a lot? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_yawn)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_yawn_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_yawn_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_yawn_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_yawn_prior_last_year_drug_names)
Did you EVER have runny eyes or a runny nose (when the effects of a medicine or drug were wearing off)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_runny_eyes_nose)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_runny_eyes_nose_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_runny_eyes_nose_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_runny_eyes_nose_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_runny_eyes_nose_prior_last_year_drug_names)
Did you EVER eat more than usual or gain weight? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_weight_gain)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_weight_gain_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_weight_gain_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_weight_gain_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_weight_gain_prior_last_year_drug_names)
Did you EVER feel anxious or nervous? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_anxious_nervous)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_anxious_nervous_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_anxious_nervous_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_anxious_nervous_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_anxious_nervous_prior_last_year_drug_names)
Did you EVER have muscle aches or cramps (when the effects of a medicine or drug were wearing off)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_muscle_aches)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_muscle_aches_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_muscle_aches_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_muscle_aches_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_muscle_aches_prior_last_year_drug_names)
Did you EVER have a fever? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_fever)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_fever_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_fever_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_fever_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_fever_prior_last_year_drug_names)
Did you EVER become so restless you fidgeted, paced or couldn't sit still? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_restless)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_restless_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_restless_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_restless_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_restless_prior_last_year_drug_names)
Did you EVER move or talk much more slowly than usual (when the effects of a medicine or drug were wearing off)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_talk_move_slowly)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_talk_move_slowly_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_talk_move_slowly_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_talk_move_slowly_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_talk_move_slowly_prior_last_year_drug_names)
Did you EVER find your pupils dilating or your hair standing up? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_pupils_dilation)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_pupils_dilation_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_pupils_dilation_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_pupils_dilation_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_pupils_dilation_prior_last_year_drug_names)
Did you EVER have unpleasant dreams that often seemed real? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_unpleasant_dreams)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_unpleasant_dreams_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_unpleasant_dreams_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_unpleasant_dreams_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_unpleasant_dreams_prior_last_year_drug_names)
Did you EVER see, feel or hear things that weren't really there (when the effects of a medicine or drug were wearing off)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_hallucinations)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_hallucinations_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_hallucinations_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_hallucinations_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_hallucinations_prior_last_year_drug_names)
Did you EVER feel shaky or have shaky or trembling hands? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_shaky_trembling_hands)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_shaky_trembling_hands_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_shaky_trembling_hands_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_shaky_trembling_hands_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_shaky_trembling_hands_prior_last_year_drug_names)
Did you EVER have trouble falling asleep or staying asleep? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_trouble_sleeping)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_trouble_sleeping_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_trouble_sleeping_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_trouble_sleeping_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_trouble_sleeping_prior_last_year_drug_names)
Did you EVER have fits or seizures (when the effects of a medicine or drug were wearing off)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_fits_seizures)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_fits_seizures_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_fits_seizures_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_fits_seizures_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_fits_seizures_prior_last_year_drug_names)
Did you EVER become more irritable than usual? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_irritable)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_irritable_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_irritable_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_irritable_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_irritable_prior_last_year_drug_names)
Did you EVER eat less than usual or lose weight? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_weight_loss)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_weight_loss_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_weight_loss_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_weight_loss_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_weight_loss_prior_last_year_drug_names)
Did you EVER feel angry, combative or aggressive (when the effects of a medicine or drug were wearing off)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_angry_aggressive)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_angry_aggressive_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_angry_aggressive_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_angry_aggressive_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_angry_aggressive_prior_last_year_drug_names)
Did you EVER have a headache? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_headache)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_headache_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_headache_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_headache_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_headache_prior_last_year_drug_names)
Did you EVER find yourself sweating? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_sweating)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_sweating_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_sweating_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_sweating_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_sweating_prior_last_year_drug_names)
Did you EVER have chills (when the effects of a medicine or drug were wearing off)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_chills)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_chills_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_chills_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_chills_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_chills_prior_last_year_drug_names)
Did you EVER have stomach pain? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_stomach_pain)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_stomach_pain_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_stomach_pain_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_stomach_pain_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_stomach_pain_prior_last_year_drug_names)

You just mentioned that you had SOME bad aftereffects when stopping or cutting down on your use of medicines or drugs in the last 12 months. Did at least 2 of these experiences happen around the same time DURING the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_after_effects_stop_use_past_year)
In your entire life, Did you EVER take more of the same or a similar medicine or drug to get over or avoid any of these bad aftereffects? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_more_same_drug)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_more_same_drug_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_more_same_drug_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_more_same_drug_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_more_same_drug_prior_last_year_drug_names)
In your entire life, Did you EVER more than once want to stop or cut down on using any of these medicines or drugs? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_desire_stop)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_desire_stop_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_desire_stop_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_desire_stop_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_desire_stop_prior_last_year_drug_names)

In your entire life, Did you EVER more than once try to stop or cut down on using any of these medicines or drugs but found you couldn't do it? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_attempt_stop_fail)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_attempt_stop_fail_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_attempt_stop_fail_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_attempt_stop_fail_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_attempt_stop_fail_prior_last_year_drug_names)
In your entire life, Did you EVER often use a medicine or drug in larger amounts or for a much longer period than you meant to? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_larger_amount_intended)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_larger_amount_intended_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_larger_amount_intended_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_larger_amount_intended_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_larger_amount_intended_prior_last_year_drug_names)

In your entire life, Did you EVER have a period when you spent a lot of time using a medicine or drug or getting over its bad aftereffects? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_after_effects_recovery)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_after_effects_recovery_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_after_effects_recovery_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_after_effects_recovery_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_after_effects_recovery_prior_last_year_drug_names)

In your entire life, Did you EVER have a period when you spent a lot of time making sure you always had enough of a medicine or drug available? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_ensuring_adequate_supply)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_ensuring_adequate_supply_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_ensuring_adequate_supply_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_ensuring_adequate_supply_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_ensuring_adequate_supply_prior_last_year_drug_names)

In your entire life, Did you EVER give up or cut down on activities that were important to you in order to use a medicine or drug-like work, school, or associating with friends or relatives? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_social_impact)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_social_impact_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_social_impact_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_social_impact_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_social_impact_prior_last_year_drug_names)

In your entire life, Did you EVER give up or cut down on activities that you were interested in or that gave you pleasure in order to use a medicine or drug? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_hobbies_impact)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_hobbies_impact_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_hobbies_impact_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_hobbies_impact_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_hobbies_impact_prior_last_year_drug_names)

In your entire life, Did you EVER continue to use a medicine or drug even though you knew it was making you feel depressed, uninterested in things, or suspicious or distrustful of other people? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_continue_use_depressed)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_continue_use_depressed_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_continue_use_depressed_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_continue_use_depressed_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_continue_use_depressed_prior_last_year_drug_names)

In your entire life, Did you EVER continue to use a medicine or drug even though you knew it was causing you a health problem or making a health problem worse? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_continue_use_health)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_continue_use_health_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_continue_use_health_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_continue_use_health_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_continue_use_health_prior_last_year_drug_names)
In your entire life, Did you EVER feel a very strong urge or desire to use a medicine or drug? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_strong_urge_desire)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_strong_urge_desire_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_strong_urge_desire_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_strong_urge_desire_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_strong_urge_desire_prior_last_year_drug_names)
In your entire life, Did you EVER want a medicine or drug so badly that you couldn't think of anything else? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_preoccupied)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_preoccupied_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_preoccupied_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_preoccupied_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_preoccupied_prior_last_year_drug_names)
In your entire life, Did you EVER have arguments with your spouse or partner or family or friends as a result of your medicine or drug use? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_spouse_argument)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_spouse_argument_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_spouse_argument_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_spouse_argument_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_spouse_argument_prior_last_year_drug_names)
In your entire life, Did you EVER continue to use a medicine or drug even though it was causing you trouble with your family or friends? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_family_trouble)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_family_trouble_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_family_trouble_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_family_trouble_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_family_trouble_prior_last_year_drug_names)
In your entire life, Did you EVER get into physical fights while under the influence of a medicine or drug? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_physical_fights)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_physical_fights_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_physical_fights_past_year_drug_name)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last?(Month one year ago)? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_physical_fights_prior_last_year)
Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_physical_fights_prior_last_year_drug_names)

In your entire life, Did you EVER have job or school troubles as a result of your medicine or drug use-like missing too much work, not doing your work well, being demoted or losing a job, or being suspended, expelled or dropping out of school? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_school_work_trouble)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_school_work_trouble_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_school_work_trouble_past_year_drug_name)

In your entire life, Did you EVER continue to use a medicine or drug even though it was causing you problems at school or work? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_continue_use_school_work)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_continue_use_school_work_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_continue_use_school_work_past_year_drug_name)

Which medicines or drugs did this happen with before 12 months ago? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_continue_use_school_work_prior_last_year_drug_names)

In your entire life, Did you EVER have a period when your medicine or drug use or your being sick from medicine or drug use often interfered with taking care of your home or family? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_sick)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_sick_past_year)
During the last 12 months, which medicines or drugs did this happen with? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_sick_past_year_drug_name)

In your entire life, Did you EVER more than once drive a car, motorcycle, truck, boat, or other vehicle when you were under the influence of a medicine or drug? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_vehicle_under_influence_multiple_times)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_vehicle_under_influence_multiple_times_past_year)

In your entire life, Did you EVER find yourself under the influence of a medicine or drug or feeling its aftereffects in situations that increased your chances of getting hurt-like swimming; using heavy machinery or equipment; or walking in a dangerous area or around heavy traffic? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_after_effects_injury)
Did this happen in the last 12 months? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_after_effects_injury_past_year)

You just mentioned some experience you had with sedatives or tranquilizers in the past, that is, before 12 months ago. Before last (Month one year ago) was there ever a period when SOME of these experiences withsedatives or tranquilizers were happening around the same time most days for at least a month (PAUSE), on and off for a few months or longer (PAUSE) or within the same 1-year period? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_sedatives_tranquilizers_experiences_prior_last_year)

About how old were you the FIRST time SOME of these experiences with sedatives or tranquilizers BEGAN to happen around the same time? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_sedatives_tranquilizers_experiences_first_time_age)

In your ENTIRE LIFE how many separate periods like this did you have when some of these experiences with sedatives or tranquilizers were happening around the same time? By separate periods, I mean times separated by at least a year when you EITHER STOPPED using sedatives or tranquilizers entirely (PAUSE) OR you didnt have any of the experiences you just mentioned with sedatives or tranquilizers. (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_sedatives_tranquilizers_experiences_number_lifetime)

In your ENTIRE LIFE what was the LONGEST period you had when SOME of these experiences with sedatives or tranquilizers were happening around the same time? Months (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_sedatives_tranquilizers_experiences_longest_period_months)

In your ENTIRE LIFE what was the LONGEST period you had when SOME of these experiences with sedatives or tranquilizers were happening around the same time? Years (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_sedatives_tranquilizers_experiences_longest_period_years)

About how old were you the MOST RECENT time when some of these experiences BEGAN to happen around the same time? (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_sedatives_tranquilizers_experiences_recent_period_age)

How long did this period last when some of these experiences with sedatives or tranquilizers were happening around the same time? Months (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_sedatives_tranquilizers_experiences_recent_period_months)

How long did this period last when some of these experiences with sedatives or tranquilizers were happening around the same time? Years (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_sedatives_tranquilizers_experiences_recent_period_years)

About how old were you when you FINALLY STOPPED having these problems with sedatives or tranquilizers? By finally stopped, I mean they never started happening again. (substances_lifetime_abuse_dependence_sedatives_tranquilizers_stopped_age)

protocol.preferredDefinition: Respondents answer questions from the National Epidemiologic Survey on Alcohol and Related Conditions-III (NESARC-III) related to their lifetime use of illicit and prescribed substances.
